text: Porphyrobacter dokdonensis is a Gram-negative, non-spore-forming, slightly halophilic and non-motile bacteria from the genus of Porphyrobacter which has been isolated from sea water in Dokdo in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Porphyrobacter dokdonensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2006
title: Porphyrobacter dokdonensis
